body:
I think we can remove the 0.16.0 Milestone from this PR:

```
10:50 < sipa> wumpus: do we want #12253 in 0.16?
10:50 < gribble> https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/12253 | SegWit support for importmulti ÃÂ· Issue #12253 ÃÂ· bitcoin/bitcoin ÃÂ· GitHub
10:51 < wumpus> sipa: if possible, but I think it's getting a bit late for that
10:52 < sipa> i certainly won't have time until next week
10:52 < wumpus> I assume the code still needs to be written, and ofc it will need to go through a review cycle
10:52 < wumpus> right, so I guess that means no
10:53 < wumpus> should probably mention lack of support in importmulti it in the 'known issues' in the release notes
```

(https://botbot.me/freenode/bitcoin-core-dev/2018-01-24/?msg=96111019&page=3)
